title: Garlic mushrooms

ingredients.content: 2 sprigs fresh flat-leaf parsley, leaves only
150 g brown onion, cut into quarters
800 g fresh brown mushrooms, cut into quarters

preparations.content: Place parsley into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>. Transfer into a bowl and set aside.
Place garlic and onion into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add butter, oil and pepper and sauté <b>2 min/120°C/speed 2<b>.
Add 400 g of the mushrooms and cook <b>2 min/120°C//speed <b>, <b>without measuring cup<b>.
Add remaining 400 g mushrooms and cook <b>6 min/120°C//speed <b>, <b>without measuring cup<b>.
Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and cook for a further <b>6 min/120°C//speed <b>, <b>without measuring cup<b>.
Add salt and reserved parsley and cook <b>1 min/120°C//speed <b>, <b>without measuring cup.<b>
Transfer into a serving bowl and serve warm with bread (see Tip).

hintsAndTricks: Serve as a side with grilled meat or poultry, with scrambled eggs or with the Country-style chicken liver fritters (please refer to the recipe on this recipe chip).
